oauth.instruction.title: Use Mixin on your phone to scan the code
oauth.instruction.install: Search Mixin in Google Play or App Store

code.multisig.title: Multisig Transfer
code.payment.scan: Use Mixin Messenger to scan the code

home.nav.title: Secure Digital Assets and Messages on Mixin
home.nav.description1: We build open source software that always puts security, privacy and decentralization first.
home.section.network: A free and lightning fast peer-to-peer transactional network for digital assets, with more than $1B total value secured.
home.section.messenger: An open source cryptocurrency wallet with Signal messaging.
home.section.mvm: A fast cross-chain smart contract platform built with the Mixin Trusted Group technology to connect all blockchains and decentralized apps.
home.section.tip: A decentralized key management protocol, that manages digital assets safely and simply through 6-digit PIN.
home.section.mtg: A solution to develop high performance decentralized app with any programming language on Mixin Network, each MTG is composed of multiple independent nodes.

messenger.features.description: An open source cryptocurrency wallet, which supports almost all popular cryptocurrencies.
messenger.features.1: Login with mobile phone number, never lose your account
messenger.features.2: Secured by 6 digit Throttled Identity Protocol (TIP)
messenger.features.3: All assets are stored in PoS-BFT-DAG distributed network
messenger.features.4: Enormous bots to extend the chat and wallet capabilities
messenger.features.5: Send cryptocurrencies directly to phone contacts
messenger.features.6: Send encrypted messages with Signal protocol
messenger.desktop.title: Mixin Messenger Desktop
messenger.desktop.description1: macOS 10.14 and higher or Windows 64-bit, Linux download from
messenger.desktop.description3: Mixin Messenger must be installed on your phone.
